sections.content: Leathercraft content showcases traditional skills—cutting, stitching, tooling, and finishing. Viewers want to see technique details: hand stitching, edge burnishing, and tooling patterns. The ASMR quality of leather work is an unexpected bonus. Here's what successful leathercraft YouTubers use.

content.title: Overhead Camera
content.description: Bird's eye of work surface. Essential.

sections.title: Leathercraft Content Tips
content: Show full project start to finish

faq.question: Best overhead setup for leatherwork?
faq.answer: C-stand with boom arm for heavy cameras—most stable. Elgato articulating arm for lighter setups. Key is stability—any shake ruins overhead shots. Position camera directly above work area.

faq.question: Should I include work sounds?
faq.answer: Yes—leathercraft sounds are satisfying. Cutting, stitching, burnishing have ASMR appeal. Many successful channels feature these sounds prominently. Separate audio recording can improve quality.

faq.question: Lighting for leather?
faq.answer: Even diffused light prevents harsh shadows in tooled patterns. Side light can show texture. Consistent throughout video. LED panels at angles work well. Avoid direct overhead that flattens texture.

faq.question: What content works for leathercraft?
faq.answer: Full project tutorials most popular. Tool reviews and comparisons. Technique breakdowns (edge finishing, stitching). Pattern/template shares. Satisfying compilation videos.
